TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DirectoryCatalog extends System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog implements class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.INotifyComposablePartCatalogChanged, class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement
Public Class DirectoryCatalog Inherits ComposablePartCatalog Implements ICompositionElement, INotifyComposablePartCatalogChanged
type DirectoryCatalog = class inherit ComposablePartCatalog interface INotifyComposablePartCatalogChanged interface ICompositionElement

summary.span: 发现所指定目录中的程序集的特性化部分。

span.span: Discovers attributed parts in the assemblies in a specified directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用要分析指定的目录的内容的对象。You can use a object to parse the contents of a designated directory. 动态链接库 (DLL) 文件中包含的任何特性化的部分是提取，并可在目录中。若要将分析限制到特定 Dll，可以指定搜索模式通过使用与相同的语法方法。Any attributed parts contained in dynamic link library (DLL) files are extracted and made available through the catalog.To restrict parsing to specific DLLs, you can specify a search pattern by using the same syntax as the method. > [!WARNING] > 指定的目录不应允许非管理员访问。The designated directory should not allow access to non-administrators. 例如，使用包含临时 Internet 文件的文件夹可以创建漏洞在应用程序中。For example, using a folder that contains temporary Internet files could create vulnerabilities in your application. 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下面的示例创建部分，从运行搜索的目录应用程序的对象。The following example creates a object that searches the directory the application runs from for parts. 它使用简单的导入测试目录。It uses a simple import to test the catalog. 为了满足此导入，DLL 的目录中必须具有匹配的导出，如本文所述的第二个代码块。To fulfill this import, a DLL in the directory must have a matching export, as illustrated in the second code block. [!code-csharp[Composition.DirectoryCatalog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.directorycatalog/cs/consoleapplication7/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Composition.DirectoryCatalog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.directorycatalog/vb/consoleapplication8/module1.vb#1)] 若要创建匹配的导出，下面的代码必须是 DLL 文件。To create the matching export, the following code must be in a DLL file. 若要在 Visual Studio 中创建的 DLL 文件，将类型"类库"的新项目添加到你的解决方案，并将此代码放入其中。To create a DLL file in Visual Studio, add a new project of the type "Class Library" to your solution, and place this code in it. [!code-csharp[Composition.DirectoryCatalog#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.directorycatalog/cs/classlibrary1/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Composition.DirectoryCatalog#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.directorycatalog/vb/classlibrary1/class1.vb#2)]

The path observed by the catalog.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 使用目录中与搜索模式相匹配的最新文件刷新 对象。

span.span: Refreshes the objects with the latest files in the directory that match the search pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文件已添加到目录，它们也添加到目录。If files were added to the directory, they are also added to the catalog. 如果文件已从目录中删除，则还会删除从目录。If files were removed from the directory, they are also removed from the catalog. 对于已删除的文件，该程序集不能为从该过程中，因此卸载对象将仅从目录中删除这些文件。For files that have been removed, the assembly cannot be unloaded from the process, so objects for those files will be removed only from the catalog.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SearchPattern As String
public: property System::String ^ SearchPattern { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取传递给 对象的构造函数的搜索模式。

span.span: Gets the search pattern that is passed into the constructor of the object.

value.span: 目录用于查找文件的搜索模式。

span.span: The search pattern the catalog uses to find files.

value.span: 默认模式为 \*.dll，该模式返回所有 DLL 文件。

span.span: The default is \*.dll, which returns all DLL files.

summary.span: 获取目录的显示名称。

value.span: 一个包含字典目录的可读显示名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains a human-readable display name of the directory catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
